title: Why the Danube is ideal for your first river cruise
text:
MORE... 
Begin your cruise in Budapest and depart at dusk (most itineraries do) and you’ll enjoy Europe’s most spectacular river-cruise sailaway. As the sun goes down, the lights come up, illuminating every detail of the neo-Gothic parliament building and bathing other landmarks, including Fisherman’s Bastion and St Stephen’s Basilica, in a golden glow reflected by the Danube.
